title: 25 Years of Stories: Love and Art
description:
This week, we play a story about motherhood from Joyce Maynard. This episode is hosted by Jodi Powell.

Host: Jodi Powell

Storyteller: Joyce Maynard
itunes:subtitle: A story about shielding your kids from pain.
itunes:author: The Moth
